abstract: Apple said Beyoncé’s surprise release last week was the fastest-selling album in iTunes history, reaching No. 1 in the sales rankings in 104 countries.
snippet: Apple said Beyoncé’s surprise release last week was the fastest-selling album in iTunes history, reaching No. 1 in the sales rankings in 104 countries.
lead_paragraph: Beyoncé’s surprise album release last week was celebrated by some commentators as a herald of things to come in the music industry, and dismissed by others as a mere stunt. But by sheer sales numbers, it was an unqualified success.

headline.main: Apple Says ‘Beyoncé’ Set a Record on iTunes
headline.print_headline: Apple Says ‘Beyoncé’ Set a Record On iTunes
